lexUnit.name: strife.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: angry or bitter disagreement; conflict

sentence.text: Two floors above , Jude heard what she took to be a domestic argument , and not wanting somebody else 's marital strife to sour her fine mood , was crossing to turn up the soul song on the turntable when somebody knocked on the door .
